name: MECHS & REX
description:
MECHS & REX

Rex controls:
- movement = WASD
- bite = SPACE

Mech controls:
- movement = ARROW KEYS
- shoot = ENTER

MECH GOAL: kill Rex
REX GOAL: Destroy 12 buildings

Helpful:

Rex can heal if you destroy the hospital
Rex can stun Mech by biting
Rex can stop bullets by biting
